sources.title: Finger Man (1955)
sources.description: An ex-con is inspired to go undercover and "finger" the mob after finding out his sister is hooked on illegal drugs. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/finger-man-1955/

sources.title: Finger Man
sources.description: Title: Finger Man Summary: An ex-con goes undercover for the government to "finger" the crime boss who made his sister a drug addict. Directed by: Harold D. Schuster Actors: Production Company: Lindsley Parsons Picture Corporation Release Date: 15 June 1955 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.85 : 1 Treasury agents, desperate to get evidence on syndicate kingpin Dutch Becker, give ex-con hood Casey Martin a choice...life in prison or courting sudden death as a government 'finger man.' Finding that his sister is now a drug addict thanks to Becker, Martin agrees to go undercover. Becker's chief aide proves to be sadistic Lou Terpe, Martin's former cellmate whom he can't stand the sight of. And the danger hanging over Martin expands to threaten those around him...

metadata.Plot: Treasury agents, desperate to get evidence on syndicate kingpin Dutch Becker, give ex-con hood Casey Martin a choice...life in prison or courting sudden death as a government 'finger man.' Finding that his sister is now a drug addict thanks to Becker, Martin agrees to go undercover. Becker's chief aide proves to be sadistic Lou Terpe, Martin's former cellmate whom he can't stand the sight of. And the danger hanging over Martin expands to threaten those around him...
metadata.Writer: Norris Lipsius, John Lardner, Warren Douglas
metadata.Actors: Frank Lovejoy, Forrest Tucker, Peggie Castle
